inn1.comm: short of a length and just outside off, Watson slaps that towards cover
not too much movement for Malinga, 137kmh, carries through nicely to the keeper after Watson lets it go
shortish ball that doesn't bounce too much, Watson looks to poke that to the off side but the ball zips past the outside edge
Malinga has pushed the pace up to 139kph, outside off and a watchful leave from Watson
and another leave outside off
a maiden to start the innings, pitched up and around off, pushed off the front foot towards the bowler
he starts with a ball that curves down the leg side, the wide gives Australia their first run
Eranga is getting some movement, but starting outside leg and going further down
length ball starting on middle and leg this time, a massive appeal from Sanga for lbw, but that looked to be heading down leg, hit high on the pad as well

is that out? Mahela seemed to have caught it at gully on the second chance, Sri Lanka start to celebrate, Marsh stands his ground, Mahela says he's not sure, the umpires confer, it was a short of length ball outside off, Marsh looked to drive that through the off, the outside edge flies to gully, strikes Mahela high on the palms, and it drops out, he look to snatch it on the second chance but the ball drops to the floor before he can latch on to it
on the legs this time,  whipped behind square leg for a couple
outside off and that is left alone

safe to say that is out, Marsh is bowled by a length delivery coming in, he was looking to clip that to the leg side, he misses the ball, through the bat-pad gap and then crashes into the top of the stumps, before running away to the fine leg boundary
well outside off, Watson is content to leave
plenty of width from Malinga this time, Watson cashes in, a controlled muscular slap behind point for  a boundary

what a beauty that was, except it was a no-ball, lovely delivery from Malinga, nipping a touch away, Watson lunges forward to defend, a healthy edge to Sangakkara, sri Lanka are distraught on seeing umpire Rauf's raise his right hand, free-hit coming up
stabs this one towards point, where Randiv makes a diving stop, Watson gets off strike
pitched up and heading for off, Ponting gets nicely forward and pushes the ball towards mid-on
another forward defensive from Ponting
another no-ball from Malinga, it was shortish and well outside off, Ponting lifts the bat over his head as he leaves that one
the slower ball from Malinga, 121 kph, Ponting was looking to send that into orbit over midwicket, he's early into the shot and can't connect, harmlessly through to the keeper, nicely done by Malinga
Eranga continues to stray on to the pads, Watson helps this along to the fine leg boundary
Eranga hurls this at 136kph, length ball on middle and off, extra bounce as well, hits Watson high on the bat as he defends to the off side
a touch shorter, same tight line on off and middle, Watson blocks from the crease to the off side
short of length and in the channel outside off, Watson stands tall as he punches it towards cover

Eranga reverts to the leg-stump line, Watson looks to whip that towards square leg, not quite off the middle of the bat and it loops past midwicket, batsmen nearly collide mid-pitch as they come back for the second
nice delivery to end the over, about a foot outside off and Watson shoulders arms
whoah! a slower ball gone wrong, 118kph, a beamer down the leg side, Ponting isn't amused, he spotted it early though and ducked
back on target now Malinga, short of length and moving away outside off, left alone
closer to the off stump this time, Ponting strides forward and leaves the ball to the keeper
sliding on to the pads, Ponting looks to push that to the leg side, off the thigh pad towards square leg, not sure whether there was any bat on that
plenty of room outside off for Watson to smash past point, gets forward and moves towards the line of the ball
a full ball heading for off stump, Watson gets his bat down in time to block that
keeps it tight outside off, Watson gets forward and defends the ball towards point
another freebie on legstump from Eranga, Ponting gets off the mark by glancing that very fine, fine leg had no chance to cut that off
better line from Eranga, back of a length and just outside off, Ponting defends towards cover
again probing outside off, Ponting again lifts the bat well over his head to leave the ball to the keeper
sticks to the offstump line, Ponting moves forward and defends it in front of point
lovely straight drive from Ponting, slightly overpitched by Eranga, Ponting leans into that one, presenting the full face as he gets it between the bowler and mid-on
way outside off, Ponting is content to leave
tossed up, fullish ball is punched towards mid-on
flighted and full, Ponting lashes that dpwn the ground, Prasanna dives quickly to his right to stop that cracking shot

superb delivery from Prasanna, huge appeal for lbw, turned down and Sri Lanka have referred it, drifts towards legstump, pitching outside actually and turns sharply back and Ponting is struck on the knee roll as he is caught on the crease, that might have spun past off stump as well, Ponting lives on
works this one towards long-on, Watson races through the first, but the batsmen decide against the second
big forward step from Watson as he watchfully defends the final ball of a good first over from Prasanna
whack! Eranga drops it short and wide, Ponting latches on to that, a powerful cut evades backward point for four

massive confusion in the running between the wickets but somehow there's no run-out, Ponting played that towards Silva at backward point, called Watson for the run and then watching the fielder turns back, Watson continues to run through and both batsman are almost at the same end, Ponting finally decides to go for it, the throw from Silva isn't great, low and behind the fielder at the non-striker's end, giving Ponting time to make his ground
short but close to offstump, Watson cuts it but can't beat the back ward point
in the channel outside off, left alone by Watson
once again Watson cuts, once again backward point fields

length ball angling in, Watson goes for the forward press, there's a massive appeal for lbw, the umpire turns it down, Sri Lanka have no more reviews left, there seemed to be a bit of an inside-edge there, which saves Watson
overpitched on legstump, driven towards mid-on
Watson wants to power that off the back foot but can't get it past cover
clipped in front of square leg, Ponting wants one but Watson doesn't
carefully blocked out to the off side
a touch short from Prasanna, Watson quickly gets the front leg out of the way and sets himself up for a trademark heave over midwicket, doesn't get hold of it and only gets a single
a graceful inside-out drive from Ponting to end the over, a touch overpitched and Ponting capitalises
don't bowl there to Watson, or most top batsman, short and wide, Watson waits on it and this time the slice is behind backward point for a boundary
Eranga compensates by bowling on the pads, nudged behind square leg
nearly goes through the bat-pad gap, Ponting lunging forward to a short of length ball that jags in a long way, an inside-edge on to the pad
similar length but on middle and leg line, tapped towards mid-on for a single
Watson opens the face to an outside off ball, guides it towards backward point
slower one from Eranga, well outside off, played towards backward point and a quick single is pinched, a direct hit would have been interesting
full ball is guided to midwicket for a single
tossed up, full and on off, punched back by Watson, Prasanna once again shows how good he is fielding off his bowling, diving acrobatically across the pitch to stop that
slapped towards cover this time
drifting outside leg and going straight after pitching, Watson is struck on the pad
a touch short and Watson power-heave makes it appearance, absolutely hammers that over midwicket, there's a man on the boundary but he can't get near that as it bounces away for four
works it away towards midwicket for a single
short of a length ball and on middle and off, 118kph,  gentle run-up from Mathews, defended to the leg side
short of length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
short from Mathews, Ponting unfurls a pull shot, swivels as he plays it, gets a single for his efforts
on middle and leg, tapped towards square leg for a single
Ponting looks to whip this short of length ball to the leg side, he misses and is struck on the pad, that was heading down the leg side so there was only a muted lbw appeal
length ball outside off, Watson crouches low as he blocks it
powers this towards deep extra cover for a single
lovely delivery, Prasanna gets this one to rip after pitching on leg and middle, spins past the outside edge as Ponting looks to guide it to the off side
flighted length ball, Ponting latches on to that, plays it inside-out and over cover for a boundary
this is another one that nearly goes straight, Ponting looking for the turn as he tries to defend to the off, inside-edge towards the leg side
very short from Prasanna, Ponting says thank you and muscles that to the midwicket boundary
defends the first ball of the over towards mid-on
full and angling in, Watson punches that down to long-on for a single
nips in from a short of length, Ponting looks to defend to the off side, struck on the pads above the knee roll, but was hit outside off

there's the breakthrough, that ball comes on slower than Ponting expected, he was early into the shot, and the ball lobs up towards midwicket, Suraj Randiv jumps forward and snaffles the ball, it was the offcutter from Mathews, not sure Ponting picked it
so what if I bowl at 120, I can still bowl bouncers, says Mathews, Clarke is surprised by that one, sways out of the way though
gets behind the line of this offstump delivery and defends it
Watson stretches forwards and eases the ball towards long-off for a single
a bit of air, Clarke backs away to make room and slaps the ball towards cover where Dilshan fields smartly
defended of the back foot
an inside-edge, again Clarke expects more turn than there is, he was looking to defend to the off side, the ball dribbles towards midwicket
short and well outside off, Clarke hangs back and slices that past point to get off the mark
full and outside off, that is blocked by Watson
more defence from Watson as that one from Mathews nips in
short from Mathews and that is pulled towards midwicket for a single
length ball outside off, defended off the front foot towards cover
patient from Clarke, watchfully played out to the off side
a bit short from Mathews and that is whipped towards deep midwicket
on target straightaway, length ball on off, not much turn, defended by Clarke
a bit short on middle and leg, Clarke rocks back and pushes it to the right of the bowler, who moves across quickly to field
short from Mendis, Clarke pulls it to midwicket
length ball heading for middle and off, careful defence from Watson
a touch short and on legstump, Watson gets well back and eases it towards long-on
slapped a diving point fielder, sweeper cover does the fielding
flighted and full, just outside off, Clarke defends off the front foot
tossed up again, on offstump, punched back towards the bowler
outside off, this one goes straight on, Clarke makes room and cuts but can't beat point
works this one towards midwicket for a single
sliding down the leg side, Watson guides the ball in front of square leg
Mendis drops it short again, steered towards sweeper cover for a single
tapped down to long-on for a single
tossed up and that is defended towards cover
there's the big hit, pure power from Watson, who hammers it over deep midwicket for six, that was a flat hit
short from Mendis, Watson clubs this past extra cover for four more, he moves on to 46
full and straight, Watson defends it cautiously
plays the final ball of the over late, steers it towards short third
flighted and full, worked past midwicket for a single
shortish and wide, Watson looks to power that through cover, can't time it ver y well
fuller this time, remains wide of off, pushed towards cover off the front foot
length ball, close to off, Watson still decides to go for the cut, makes room and slaps it to backward point
punched back to the bowler this time
and only one off that over as Watson plays the final ball back to Ajantha Mendis
short of length ball on middle and leg, cautious forward defence from Clarke
nearly takes out Michael Clarke with a muscled hit towatds long-on, Clarke skips out of the way
a full ball is driven back towards the bowler
whips this one behind square leg for a single, thinks of the second but there's no time
short and wide, Mendis lucky to escape there, Watson makes room and lashes that towards cover but the timing isn't great
overpitched, Clarke sashays down the track and drives towards extra cover
Watson gets to fifty, laces the ball towards sweeper cover to get to that minor landmark
punched to the right of the bowler and down to long-on for a single
Clarke was initially looking to get forward there, stays on the crease and tucks the ball to midwicket
outside off and Watson steers it towards cover point for a single
short and very wide, Clarke reaches out for that one, jabs it past point
finally a dot ball in the over, Clarke looks to drive down the ground but gets an inside-edge, ball rolls to the leg side
Clarke goes well back in the crease, shuffles across and nudges the ball to square leg
"bowling," says Sanga as a fullish ball is defended back to the bowler
overpitched and on legstump, whipped towards midwicket
short and wide, seems to be plenty of those on offer, Clarke gets back and slashes that towards deep point

that short ball keeps low and foxes everyone, Watson was again looking to launch that to midwicket, the ball sneaks under the bat, Sangakkara is also taken by surprise and is nutmegged, some byes result, Mendis kicks the ground in annoyance
starts with a shortish ball on middle, batsman gets behind the line and defends
length ball in the channel outside off, Clarke helps it along towards short third man
shorter this time, and it is blocked down the track
Malinga searching for the blockhole, ends up a touch shorter than he wants, Clarke wants to club that to the leg side, mistimed to midwicket
short and wide this time, Clarke cuts and gets it past point
a low full toss on middle stump, pushed towards mid-on, not much power behind that shot, Watson happy to just keep that one out
on middle and leg stump, clipped towards backward square leg
Watson looking to cut a full delivery, he has got away with that a few times, this time it bounces over the top edge
watchful forward defensive towards the bowler
once again full face of the bat as he pats it to the bowler
a touch short this time, Watson stands tall and defends to off
lovely from Prasanna, Watson is beaten by the turn, pitching on offstump and drawing Watson forward, he wants to tap that to the off side but the ball spins past the outside edge
streaky for Clarke, Malinga gives him some width, Clarke chases after it and gets a top edge, it flies well wide of the keeper and fine enough to beat third man
played with soft hands towards point for a single
Clarke punches it to the left of mid-on, there isn't enough time to get a run
short of length ball on middle, Clarke whips it towards square leg
a short ball from Malinga, bounces loopily outside off, Watson sways out of the way of that one
another bouncer, good line but was too high, over the batsman's head and that's a wide, Watson was initially looking to hook but pulls out on seeing how big the ball got
full and on legstump, thumped towards midwicket, Watson picks up a couple
the wrong Ãºn from Prasanna, Clarke didn't read that, lucky to get an inside-edge on to the pad
helped past square leg for a single
down the leg side, helped towards deep square leg to bring up the 50 partnership
Clarke using his feet to get to the pitch and turns it towards deep midwicket
guided down to short third to end a good over from Prasanna
Clarke again uses his feet, the carrom ball from Mendis, Clarke reaches the pitch of the ball and lifts it over mid-off to get a boundary to long-off
guides this one towards short fine leg for a single
better ball from Mendis, length ball pitching on off, careful defence from Watson
punched firmly back towards the bowler
the end of Watson, the flighted googly, Watson tried to hammer it over midwicket, gets a top edge and the ball swirls high, Tharanga gets under it at deep midwicket and pouches it
short ball to end the over, Clarke rocks back and puts that away past square leg for four
full and wide outside off, Hussey gets his front leg well outside off as he leaves the ball
Hussey stays in the crease and looks to steer that outside off ball towards cover, he's beaten
pushed towards mid-off, Hussey wants one, Clarke asks him to stay put
outside off, Hussey shoulders arms
once more well outside off, left alone
a maiden from Prasanna, the first since the first over of the innings, Hussey tucks the final ball of the over to midwicket
shortish, Clarke works it backward square leg
length ball outside off, Hussey steps forward and drive that towards deep extra cover to get off the mark
length ball sliding towards leg, defended down the pitch
Clarke shuffles across and tucks the ball behind square for one more
sprays this down the leg side, Hussey tries to sweep but doesn't connect
Mendis lucky that only went for a single, it slipped out of his hand and was a half-tracker, sat up for Hussey who could only slug it deep backward square leg
Clarke again shimmies across the stump and dabs the ball towards midwicket
overpitched on legstump, Clarke has been using his feet well this innings, once again he charges down and works the ball towards long-on
defended to the off side and the batsmen zip through for a single
heading down leg once more, Clarke moves across and guides it behind square leg
length ball outside off, once more Hussey defends to the off side, Clarke rejects the call for a single
gets to the pitch and punches it towards long-on
spinning down the leg side, an appeal for a caught-behind from Sanga, not much from the bowler, off the pads I think
full ball is punched towards mid-off
the legspinner from Mendis, length ball is pushed towards cover

huge appeal, the straighter one from Mendis, Huseey misses that one and is struck below the knee roll, that might have been slipping down leg, replays show it is going to hit leg, Hussey lucky to survive
full ball is guided towards mid-on

down the leg side and that was a tough stumping chance, Sanga can't collect that and Clarke sets off for a single before realising the ball isn't too far from the stumps.. Sanga lobs the ball at the stumps but misses and Clarke survives
driven to the right of the diving fielder to get a single

the googly does the job, Hussey looking to drive that one, doesn't read the turn, gets a thin outside edge, Sanga collects and that's another wicket for Sri Lanka, big innings coming up this for David Hussey
pushed towards the off side
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
tossed up outside off stump, driven towards long-off but not timed well
Clarke moves forward and drives the ball to long-on
Hussey moves back and tries to force the ball through the off, but mis-times it towards the bowler
Hussey defends back to the bowler, he's looking extremely tentative
a short ball keeps extremely low and beats Hussey's pull, nearly bowled him
another short ball, this time it bounces properly, Hussey waits and pulls towards deep square leg
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
played off the back foot through cover point
watchful forwards defence from Hussey
shorter from Mendis, on middle stump, tentaively blocked
gets forward and sm0others this one
goes back and punches the ball towards long-off
sashays down the track and he defends it back to the bowler
overpitched from Eranga, Hussey latches on to that, scythes it to the cover boundary, not the best of starts for Eranga
length delivery on off, defended to the off side
full delivery this time, Hussey defends from the crease
a bit short from Eranga and that his hit towards cover
swung behind square leg for  single
short of length ball outside off, Clarke gets on his toes and chops that past point
comes down the track and jabs it back towards the bowler
whipped towards long-on this time
a bit short once more, stays back and slaps it towards cover
playing down the wrong line this time, inside-edge towards the leg side
tossed up delivery, just outside off, another inside-edge on to the pad
backs away to make room, guides the legspinner towards cover
opens the face to steer the ball towards point
spearing in towards the stump, Hussey wanted to whip that to the leg side, leading edge towards cover
short of length and just outside off, Hussey looks to cut but that slips under his bat
pushed towards mid-off for a tight single
short and very wide, extra bounce there for Eranga, but too far outside off to worry the batsman
a good-looking drive from Clarke, sends the ball towards deep extra cover

Eranga has struck, this is a big blow, Clarke is gone, and Australia have two new batsmen at the crease, that was a short of length ball, pitching just outside off, goes on with angle and induces the outside edge, Clarke's patient innings comes to an end
steered towards point
a half-tracker for Hussey to put away, he gets back and wallops it towards midwicket for four
very wide outside off, Hussey looks to crunch that through the off but bottom edges it down the track
solidly defended down the pitch
defended to the off side this time
another outside edge, would have been a simple take for first slip, there isn't one though and the ball runs down towards third man
short of length ball outside off, defended towards backward point
similar length, guides it down to third man for a single
slaps this one towards backward point
Eranga keeps it back of a length, provides width this time, chopped towards deep backward point
full this time, aiming for the blockhole, driven towards mid-on for a single
short and down the leg side, Sangakkara leaps to try collect that, gets a glove on it
aims to cut this one, bottom-edges it to the right of the keeper, Sanga moves across to collect
flighted and pitched up, driven back towards the bowler
short this time, outside off, Hussey gets back and slaps it towards cover
a full toss but that isn't put away, Hussey thumps it down the ground, finishing the stroke with a typical flourish, but he can't get it past long-on
punched back towards the bowler
good over this, only three so far, once more defended to the left of the bowler
muscles it towards cover, but a diving stop prevents it from going too far, the cover love the acrobatic fielding
Malinga returns, and starts with a typical delivery aiming for the toes, dug out towards midwicket
a low full toss this time, Hussey looks to swing it to midwicket, but inside-edges it on to his pad
another full toss, Hussey backing away, that was beyond leg stump but Hussey had skipped further beyond, bunts it towards mid-on
a hat-trick of full tosses, this one is on off stump, Hussey swings it towards mid-off for a single
a dipping full toss from Malinga, just outside off, Haddin blocks it to the off side
this time Malinga drops it short of the yorker he wants, Haddin lashes it towards sweeper cover
full and heading for off, pushed back towards the bowler
keeps it around off, again patted back to the bowler
there's the swipe from Haddin, he doesn't hit it hard enough to carry all the way to the deep midwicket fielder
Sanga roars out an appeal, Haddin is struck on the pads as he looks sweep, that looked to be sliding down, Rauf turns down the appeal
a boundary to end the over, Haddin muscles it to the deep midwicket boundary
Malinga continues his pursuit of the blockhole, Hussey wants to club that over the on side but gets an inside-edge that zips past the keeper for four
this time it is on target, Malinga goes full and for middle, Hussey mistimes it towards mid-on
low full toss spearing down leg, there is another big lbw appeal as Haddin can't get bat on ball, again that slipping down, the ball dribbles away to the on side for a leg bye
slower length ball from Malinga, 118kph, off the toe of the bat and over the bowler's head for a couple

Shot! superb hit from Hussey, Malinga pitches it short of the desired yorker length, Hussey gets his front leg out of the way and hammers it past extra cover for four, Malinga has a rueful grin after that shot
tailing in to the legs, inside-edged by Hussey, who was desperately trying to save his toes
skips away from leg and punches that middle stump delivery towards deep extra cover for two
brilliant from Hussey, charges down the track and launches that legspinner from Mendis towards the sightscreen, comfortably clears the rope, a good innings this from Hussey, he moves on to 46
what a comeback from Mendis, that one spins in, Hussey doesn't read it and is caught on the back foot as he looks to cut that one, it slips past the bat and into middle and leg stump
length ball is tucked to the leg side
full and on the pads, tucked towards deep midwicket for a single
a dot ball to end the over as Haddin is struck on the pads outside leg
slower length ball, 116kph, Johnson spots it and checks his shot, defends to the off side

Malinga you beauty, that spot-on yorker is far too good for Johnson, who was striving to get his bat down and keep that out but the ball zips past the batsman's defence and crashes into the bottom of legstump

Malinga is on a hat-trick now, or is Australia going to review this lbw?  They have reviewed it. It was a low full toss, swinging dangerously in, the new batsman John Hastings couldn't keep it out, thuds into his pads, struck in front of legstump, umpire upholds the appeal, was it going down? the replay shows it would have taken the outside of leg stump, have to stick with the umpire's call for that, which means Hastings is gone for a golden duck

hat-trick for Malinga, another of those laser-guided low full tosses,  Xavier Doherty has no chance, the middle stump is rattled, and Australia are down to 211 for 9, so much for the Powerplay, that's Malinga's third hat-trick in one-dayers, the most anyone has ever taken
no he can't, it's full and well outside off, squeezed out towards the off side
full and strikes Pattinson low on the pads, going down leg but that doesn't prevent Malinga from belting out an appeal, a triple-wicket maiden in the Powerplay, well done Malinga

and the Australian inninigs has come to a rather rapid end, Mendis gets his third as Haddin tamely chips the ball to mid-off, Australua bowled out for 211, with nearly four overs remaining, two overs ago Australia were 210 for 5

inn2.comm: a full swinging ball on the legstump, clipped behind square leg by Tharanga
and again, Johnson perhaps trying to do a Malinga, full and swinging in, down the leg side, off Tharanga's  pads to fine leg for four
short of length ball just outside off, blocked back towards the bowler
Tharanga is gone, Johnson strikes in the first over, short of length ball outside off, Tharanga fishes at it, a thin edge through to the keeper
fires it in full and on the pads, Sangakkara leans across and elegantly clips it to the midwicket boundary, the crowd finds its voice again
Sangakkara takes the bottom hand off the bat as he blocks a short of length ball to the leg side, a quick single is pinched
starts with a back of length ball outside off, defended
punched back towards the bowler this time
swinging down the leg side, and that's a free run
Pattinson spears that in at 141kph, outside off and Sangakkara lets it go
seams in from short of a length, helped along to fine leg
A big wicket for Australia, Sangakkara joins Tharanga in the pavilion, he is also drawn towards a short of length ball outside off, top edged to the keeper, Sri Lanka slip to 12 for 2
sharply seams away after pitching on a back of a length, Mahela lets it through to the keeper
jags in this time from Johnson, Dilshan attempts a Hollywood drive, gets an inside edge behind square leg
length ball on legstump, tucked towards square leg
pitched up and just outside off, pushed towards cover
a bouncer from Johnson, gets big on Mahela, off the handle of the bat and lands wide of slips
Dilshan helps this one to square leg for a single
defends the final ball of the over to the leg side
length ball angling in towards off, pushed back towards the bowler
shortish ball outside off, Dilshan wants to launch that over midwicket, doesn't get near it
length ball in the channel outside off, jags away a touch, Dilshan is beaten as he looks to defend, impressive start from Pattinson
short ball on leg stump, this time the Dilshan pull connects, lands just short of the rope, one bounce four
prods the ball towards the off side, thinks of a single but decides against
full on middle and leg, whipped wide of mid-on for a boundary, early wickets aren't enough to make Dilshan change his game
caressed towards sweeper cover by Mahela, not much footwork but gracefully pushed for three
short of length an around off stump, pushed towards point
full and well outside off, Dilshan chases after it, though he was in no position to play that, he doesn't connect, D Hussey has his hands on his head as he expects an edge
low, wide full toss, once more Dilshan stretches across and slaps the ball but can't get it past point
this one is closer to the body, and short, Dilshan dismisses that to the square leg boundary, powerfully pulled away
another short ball, another pull from Dilshan, this time the timing isn't great, but the ball is in the gap, long chase for the midwicket fielder, enough time to get a three
Dilshan doesn't bother moving his feet or getting behind the line, wants to swing that one to the leg side, he doesn't connect
short ball sliding down, Dilshan gets in position for the pull, but that one keeps lower than Dilshan expects, he is hit in the stomach

got him! Pattinson continues to catch the eye in this opening burst, after peppering Dilshan with the short stuff, he slips in a quick full ball, Dilshan is caught on the crease, he inside-edges that onto the pad, and the ball homes in on offstump, superb bowling from Pattinson
appeal for lbw as Silva shuffles towards off and looks to flick a legside delivery, off the pad to left of Haddin
back of length ball, Jayawardene gets behind the line and defends it towards point
well outside off and that is left alone by Jayawardene
angling across the stumps, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
superb take from Haddin, this was down the leg side and swerving away, leaps to his left and sticks out his hand to collect that, plenty of bounce there for Johnson

massive appeal for lbw, that was pretty high though, Silva doesn't get forward or back as he looks defend a shortish ball from Johnson, he is struck above the pad, that would have definitely gone over the stumps
Silva slaps this length delivery through the covers, not too well timed but placed well enough to get himself three, and off the mark as well
full and outside off, nicely guided down to third man for a single
shot! Silva gets forward and drives on the up, past a diving mid-off, that stroke should give him plenty of confidence
on the leg stump, helped along to fine leg, Mahela not trying fancy here, just guiding the ball behind the wicket
Silva goes for a booming drive through cover, a length ball angling across, he doesn't connect
shorter this time, just outside off and defended towards point
worked past midwicket for a couple
a swinging 141kph delivery, perilously close to the edge, an airy drive from Silva, doesn't get bat on ball
short of length ball on offstump, solidly defended by Silva
on the pads, tucked towards midwicket for a quick single

outstanding fielding from Pattinson at deep square leg, a full toss is swept hard by Silva, well wide of Pattinson, who sprints across and does extremely well to keep it from reaching the rope, Clarke applauds the effort
this time it is a boundary, another sweep this time well in front of square, lands just short of the rope
jumps down the track and defends to the off side
the sweep proving productive for Silva, one more of those gets him a boundary, this time very fine, and that makes it 11 off the over
short of length and outside off, pushed towards cover
extra bounce and nips back as well, Mahela can't get bat on that one, it sneaks past the inside edge and strikes him on the thigh
well outside the off stump
pushed towards point by Jayawardene
down the leg side, and that's a wide
Hastings is getting the ball to move here, but is getting the line badly wrong, down the leg side once again
much better line this time, pitching outside off and coming towards the stumps, batsman shoulders arms
short and wide, Mahela climbs into that one, the area around point is extremely productive for Mahela, he slaps that it past point for four
another wide outside off, Hastings needs to get his lines right
gets it on target this time, defended back towards the bowler
pushed off the front foot towards cover
nearly the end of Silva, he is drawn towards a short of length ball outside off, doesn't get the nick though
short ball and that is miles over the batsman's head
short of length and on offstump, tapped towards mid-on and the batsmen immediately set off for a single
a direct hit, is that out? Mahela pokes the ball towards cover and sets off a single, Ponting pounces on it and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end, Mahela has just made it in time
tucked towards mid-on for a single
length ball outside off, pushed towards mid-off off the front foot
way down the leg side
Silva continues his uncomfortable stay, he closes the face looking to play to leg, leading edge towards gully
sharp inward movement for Hastings, Silva inside-edges on to his pads
well outside off and that is guided towards backward point
overpitched and outside off, swings in and gets an inside-edge towards short leg
shortish and well outside off, a big cheer from the crowd as that is signalled wide, six wides from Hasting now
driven towards wide mid-on for a single, Silva gets off the strike
another inducker, pitched up by Hastings, Jayawardene plays it towards midwicket
Watson's turn to spray it, down the leg side
much better line from Watson, on a length and just outside off, solidly defended to the off side
and a similar delivery, tucked towards midwicket for a single

Silva streaky stay continues, a massive appeal for lbw, turned down, Clarke wanted the review immediately, that pitches short of a length outside off, catches Silva on the back foot, hit in line but that was sliding down, silva survives much to the crowd's delight
another edge for Silva, he doesn't know where the middle of the bat is, throws his bat at a length ball outside off, outside edge flies wide of slip for four to third man
this time he has found the middle of the bat, a pitched up delivery, Silva dances down the track and punches that between the bowler and mid-on for four, superb timing on that
blocked to the right of Watson, who moves across quickly and prevents the single
length ball just outside off, defended by Mahela
jags back in dramatically towards the batsman, who drops it towards point
outside off and Silva wisely decides to leave
Silva shimmies down the track before the bowler delivers, it is a length ball coming in, he gets it away towards short fine
confidently defended off the front foot towards cover
an uneventful over comes to an end, as Mahela allows an outside off ball through to the keeper
Johnson starts the spell with a length ball on middle and off, pushed back past the bowler
Johnson joins the wides party, down the leg side
length ball on leg stump, tucked towards backward square leg
lovely stroke from Chamara Silva, wide and full, Chamara gets well forward and caresses it for four in front of point
length delivery angling across him, Silva pushes it to the off side
tapped towards mid-off, a single is pinched as the fielder is on the edge of the circle
Mahela stands tall and defends the final ball of the over
test Silva with a bouncer, batsman ducks under early
another bouncer, too high this time and one more to the wides tally
short of length ball, Silva hops down the crease in an attempt to throw the bowler off his length, played past short leg
Silva looks to swing that one towards midwicket, struck on the pads and that was sliding down
the outswinger from Hastings, length ball outside off, beats the outside edge
and again Silva misses the ball, this time he is looking to drive off the front foot, this was wider than the previous delivery
length ball on off, pushed towards mid-on by Silva
full and wide, Mahela eases it past cover for a single
tries the yorker, just outside off, off the bottom of the bat and squeaks past the stumps, hasn't been the most assured of innings from Silva
solidly defended to the off side by Mahela
down the leg side, Australia are being very generous here, 13 wides already
full and wide, Mahela jabs it towards point
yet another wide, full and far outside off, wide No. 14 that one
gets it on target this time, length ball on offstump, defended by Mahela
homing in on off stump, punched back towards the bowler
a bouncer to start the over, perilously close to be a wide
works this past short leg for a single
the 100 comes up with wide No. 15,  Aus bowling coach Craig McDermott is going to be an angry man today
poked towards point this time
nearly sneaks between bat and pad, that one dips in sharply, and takes the inside-edge as Mahela looks to defend towards the off side, ball rolls towards the leg side instead
full and well outside off, pushed towards cover
Hastings getting his line right, outside off once more and Mahela dabs it towards point
big appeal for lbw as Silva looks to sweep, struck on the pads but was spinning past off stump
shot! Silva stretches well forward and sweeps powerfully, there is a deep backward square but this one has the legs to clear the rope
swept again, and another boundary for him, this time he gets it very square, that goes a long way to the rope before bouncing, batsmen punch gloves as Sri Lanka take control
carefully defended back to the bowler
played with a bit of an open face towards point
shortish and down the leg side, pulled, high on the bat as it runs down to fine leg
Pattinson gets this one to move in as well, played behind square leg

short of length ball on legstump, tucks it to the leg side for the single that brings up his half-century, he has a huge smile on his face after getting to the landmark, an innings under pressure this
Mahela moves across and tucks the ball to square leg
full and on the off, Silva stretches forward and defends it
a bouncer to end the over and Silva ducks under that one
length ball heading for off, blocked towards the bowler
length ball on off, guided towards point
pushed back towards the bowler, Mahela is playing a patient hand here
that spins away after pitching on off, Mahela backs  away to make more room and cuts that towards point
jumps down the track and taps the ball to the off side
Silva very confident against the spinner, pats the ball towards point, thinks of the single but decides against it
Mahela punches the first ball towards mid-off
awesome placement from Mahela, a short ball is pulled behind square for four, Marsh races across from square leg while there a fielder at backward square leg as well, the ball manages to evade both
helps it along to fine leg
short and a bit of width, Silva slaps that down to deep backward point
short and outside off, Mahela rides the bounce, steers the ball down to third man
short of length ball and outside off, defended to the off side
spins sharply away from Mahela, who lets pushes at it but doesn't edge
fuller delivery this time, punched back to the bowler
briefly in the air prompting cries of catch it, but that lands wide of a diving short cover
tucked to short fine leg, Silva wants one, Mahela doesn't
superb from Silva, the reverse-sweep, premeditated, gets the power and placement right and that's four to third man
gets nicely forward and defends it
turn on offer, spinning in but hits Mahela on the pads outside off
tucked towards square leg
attempts a flamboyant drive after getting to the pitch, can't get hold of it and it is sent back towards the bowler
very wide outside off, cut hard towards point
delicately done by Mahela, makes room and guides the ball to third man
an elegant front-foot drive from Silva, very well timed and sweeper cover has plenty of ground to make to cut that off
driven towards sweeper cover off the front foot
gets well forward and defends towards point
that sweep shot again, gets it to deep backward square leg where a fumble allows an extra run
looks to guide that towards third man
solid forward defensive, keeping bat and pad together
heading for leg stump, clipped towards square leg for a single
well well, Silva shimmies down the track and looks to pull that one, mistimed towards mid-off
length ball just outside off, carefully defended by Mahela
short of length and just outside off, guided behind point
a wristy shot towards wide mid-on for a single, Silva continues to move round in the crease before the bowler delivers
length ball heading for off, solidly defended back down the track
glided down to third man for a single
blocked off the front foot towards cover
inside-out lofted drive towards sweeper cover, the fielder dives and tries to relay throw the ball, but gets it past the supporting fielder so Sri Lanka get three
the end of Silva, this has been a good innings from him, it's the sweep shot that brings about his downfall, a bit of a top edge and John Hastings is waiting for that at deep square leg
speared in towards leg stump, carefully defended towards the bowler
first ball after the interruption is defended towards the off side
a silken drive down to long-off for a single
length ball on off stump, blocked to the off side
once more, defended off the front foot to the off side
short of length ball, soft hands as Mahela defends
looks to chop a short of length ball, if he had nibbled that australia would have been well and truly back in the game
on leg stump, off the pads and down to fine leg, that pitched outside leg
driven nicely off the front foot, wide of covers for a single
tossed up, full and on legstump, blocked to the leg side
again into the pads, tucked towards midwicket for a single
length ball outside off this time, pushed towards cover
a bit of an outside edge as Angelo drives towards extra cover, Sri Lanka's 150 comes up
length ball is pushed back to the bowler
blocked that quicker one with an open face
nicely finds the gap, gets forward and taps the ball past cover for a couple
back of length and outside off, pushed towards extra cover
low full toss outside off, Mathews pats it back to the bowler
length ball is punched past the bowler, mid-off comes across to field
short ball doesn't rise up as much as Angelo expects, he drops his wrists as he lets that one through, it was a slower one as well, doesn't carry through to the keeper
driven to cover off the front foot, no run there
length ball on off, careful defence off the front foot
pushed towards cover once more
more defence from Mahela
length ball outside off, pushed off the front foot to cover
down the leg side, tucked behind square for one more
deadbatted off the front foot by Mathews
short of length ball just outside off, guided down to third man
short and wide, slapped towards sweeper cover off the back foot
blocked towards mid-on
the inside-edge saves Mahela, this one nips back after pitching short of a length, Mahela edges it on to his pads, the ball rolls towards short third
pushed back towards the bowler
short of length and on middle and leg, guided down to fine leg
more watchfulness from Sri Lanka, Mahela blocks it to the off side
a length ball on middle and off is swept down to fine leg

close call for Mahela, that one spins away from Mahela, who gets an inside-edge as he looks to play it to the off side, it is a thick edge, thick enough to comfortably beat Haddin, but not to crash into the stumps
worked to backward square leg to complete his half-century
blocked off the front foot towards the off side
flighted ball, pushed towards mid-off for a single
a swing and a miss outside off, it was full and wide from Watson, Mahela doesn't get the edge
Mahela leading a charmed life here, another inside-edge as the ball seams in, this time the edge takes the ball past legstump
opens the face and sends it towards third man where a fumble gives away an extra run
looks to clip the ball to the leg side, misses and is hit on the pads, that was sliding down
big forward stride as Mahela defends to the off side
more watchful defence, towards extra cover
good bounce as he angles that away from Mathews, who shoulders arms
drops it towards midwicket
short of a length on legstump, worked in front of square
angles across Mahela, who is initially drawn towards it but he withdraws the bat well in time
nearly another wide from Australia, Rauf decides that close enough to offstump
full ball on middle and leg is defended back towards the bowler
mistimed to the right of the bowler
punched from the crease towards cover
short of length ball just outside off, defended to the leg side
similar delivery, blocked to the off side by Mathews, in no hurry whatsoever here Sri Lanka
overpitched and on the pads, whipped wide of mid-on, he outfield has slowed down after the rain, Angelo scampers three
crisply driven by Mahela, straight to short cover
short of length and angling across, guided behind point
a bouncer and Mathews doesn't play that very well, he didn't get out of the line of the ball, starts to ducks and then attempts a cramped pull, which sends the ball to the leg side
angling across once more, Mahela is drawn to it but then tucks it close to his body to leave
steered down to fine leg after shuffling across
a quick one on the pads, rolls down to fine leg
short of length ball on middle stump, blocked back down the pitch
clipped in front of square leg for a comfortable single

Mahela should have been run out but he survives< he pushes the ball towards mid-on, where Doherty makes a smart stop, Mahela was watching the ball as he started running the single, Mathews takes a couple of steps before sending Mahela back, Mahela is more than halfway down, and has to scramble back, the throw from Doherty is wild though, reprieving Mahela
chopped towards cover for a single
defended to the right of the bowler
short and well outside off, looks to pull that, off the bottom edge as the ball dribbles to the leg side
short of length ball outside off, defended back towards the bowler
seams in after pitching outside of, Mahela edges it on to the pads
short and wide, easily guided down to third man
jags in once more, from a short of length, blocked to the bowler
another push to the off side
keeps it around off, defended towards the leg side
a flamboyant pull to deep midwicket for a single
length ball outside off, driven towards mid-off
length ball on middle and leg, helped towards wide mid-on for an easy single
full and slanting down, Mahela helps it along to fine leg for a freebie four
short of length ball just outside off, defended towards square leg
a moment of panic for Mahela, as his lofted drive just loops over cover for a single
full delivery is punched back to the bowler
short of length ball outside off, careful defence to the off side
played with soft hands towards point, sets off for a single but a loud 'No' from Mathews send him back
slapped towards point by Mahela
short ball on off and middle, Mahela ducks under
pulled down to deep backward square leg for a single
shot! where did that come from? Mahela was all patience so far, suddenly he jumps out of the crease to play a lofted inside-out drive over mid-off for four
back to watchfulness, defended to the leg side
pushed wide of mid-on for a single that brings up the 50 stand
comes down the track and defends down the track, Doherty collects and fires the ball back towards the stumps
short and wide, steered behind backward point

is there a twist to this game? Mahela is gone, he looked to launch that over mid-off once more, this was a flighted and full delivery, Mahela gets it too high, can't get the distance and his innings end on 71
short of length ball on middle and leg stump, nudged towards square leg
full and outside off, blocked towards the bowler
short of length ball, struck on the pads but that was an optimistic appeal, that was going down leg
shortish ball and coming in, Mathews has to contend with some extra bounce, he guides the ball to third man
careful defence to the leg side
Mathews gets his first boundary, not the most elegant of shots or the best timed, he gets that away over extra cover and the ball runs away for four
full ball from Pattinson, defended to the leg side
short of length ball outside off, pushed towards cover from the crease
length ball outside off, slapped towards cover by Mathews
driven to cover after jumping down the track
length ball heading for off, blocked by Mathews
well outside off, left alone
gets the outside edge, the ball loops towards point, Ponting dives forward to take that but it lands short, top effort from Ricky
length ball outside off, solid defence to the right of the bowler
guides this short of length ball towards point
short of length ball, Mendis pulls, the fielder at square leg slips initially, Sri Lanka pick up a couple
driven behind point by Mathews, only seven more needed
outside edge as Mathews looks to run it to third man, it doesn't go as wide as he intends but wide of first slip to run away for four
length ball on middle and that is defended by Mathews
Mathews is gone, he wanted to close out the game with a flourish, advancing down the track and looks to club that one, caught at mid-off by Doherty
defends his first ball confidently
outside off, left alone by Eranga
angling across and that is left alone
huge appeal for lbw, short of a length ball and angling across, Mendis jumps across the stumps and is struck on the thigh pad, that was missing off, and pitched outside leg as well
way outside off and that is left alone
punched towards mid-off by Mendis
defended off the front foot towards cover

it's all over, the final stretch was a hard grind but Sri Lanka have finally made it past the finish line, and it was a streaky shot that confirmed the win, an outside edge past the second slip for four, Sri Lanka are back to No. 2, India slip to No. 3 in both Tests and ODIs on the same day
